nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: [The lab is a horrifying mix of advanced technology and organic matter. Figures float in nutrient tanks, their bodies warped and fused with crystalline structures.] Captain... these are human subjects. They've been... augmented with void matter. This is highly illegal.

nodes.speaker: dr_aris_lead_researcher
nodes.text: [A woman in a stained lab coat emerges from the shadows, her eyes burning with fanaticism.] Illegal? The laws of Earth mean nothing out here. We are on the verge of the greatest breakthrough in human history. We are not just surviving the void. We are becoming it.

choices.text: "You're a monster. This station is being shut down."
[Press Further] "What is the purpose of these experiments?"

nodes.speaker: dr_aris_lead_researcher
nodes.text: Monster? I am a savior! When the Phantoms come for your ship, when the Swarm devours your worlds, you will beg for the soldiers I am creating.

nodes.speaker: dr_aris_lead_researcher
nodes.text: We are creating the next stage of human evolution. Soldiers who can withstand the void, who can hear the Song of Unmaking and not break. We are fighting fire with fire.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: You're torturing people. There's no justification for this. On my authority as a Federation officer, you are under arrest.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Dr. Aris stands defiant before her horrific creations. The subjects in the tanks occasionally twitch. The choice is yours.

choices.text: Arrest her and shut down the station.
[Computer Science] "Kim, get to the main server. Download all of her research. We're taking it."
"Your work is... necessary. I will provide you with resources to continue."

nodes.speaker: dr_aris_lead_researcher
nodes.text: You fools! You are signing your own death warrant! Security drones, activate!

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: I have the data, Captain. It's... horrifying, but the potential applications are... staggering.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: She had a logic bomb on the server! I couldn't stop it! All the research has been wiped!

nodes.speaker: dr_aris_lead_researcher
nodes.text: A wise decision, Captain. Together, we will forge a new humanity, capable of withstanding the coming storm.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The station's security drones activate, their weapons glowing.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have stolen Dr. Aris's research, a powerful and dangerous new tool in your arsenal.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have chosen to ally with Dr. Aris, embracing her monstrous methods for the sake of survival.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have chosen to shut down the station, and must now fight your way out.
